cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.PL. 

The paper deals with control problems in Markov decision processes (MDPs) and introduces a new optimization criterion for MDP policies. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Robotics (cs.RO) sub-categories, which deal with decision-making and control problems. The paper also mentions the use of algorithms and computation, which suggests that it may also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with the satisfaction of specifications, which suggests that it may also belong to the Programming Languages (cs.PL) sub-category, which deals with formal methods and verification.
